alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Sebastian (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 08 at 5:49AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHWESTERN CRAWFORD AND SEBASTIAN COUNTIES THROUGH 615 AM CDT... At 549 AM CDT, Doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm 3 miles northeast of Fort Smith Regional Airport, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations in or near the path include... Fort Smith... Van Buren... Greenwood... Barling... Lavaca... Arkoma... Mansfield... Hackett... Huntington... Bonanza... Midland... Excelsior... Fort Smith Regional Airport... Bloomer... Washburn... Burnville... Jenny Lind... Central City... Arkola... Crossroads... This includes the following highways, Interstate 40 in Arkansas between mile markers 3 and 5. Interstate 540 between mile markers 1 and 14. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
